general.title: CAEFISS 2.0 Benchmarker
general.desc: This is a tool built for CAEFISS2.0 to upload an audit log JSON file. You can generate visual metrics based on your chosen type.

generatorTypes.storyPointsDesc: Generate a graph that shows your ticket performance based on story points and their expected benchmark

warning.fileType: Incorrect file type, please use a JSON file

errors.upload: There was an error uploading the file
errors.generated: There was an error generating the image
errors.download: There was an error downloading the image
